SELECT EDU_COURSE.ID AS COURSE_ID, EDU_COURSE.NAME, EDU_COURSE.TITLE, EDU_COURSE.LOGO FROM APP_MAIN_COURSE LEFT JOIN EDU_COURSE ON EDU_COURSE.ID=APP_MAIN_COURSE.COURSE_ID LEFT JOIN EDU_COURSE_SUBJECT ON EDU_COURSE_SUBJECT.COURSE_ID = EDU_COURSE.ID LEFT JOIN edu_course_profile ON EDU_COURSE.ID=edu_course_profile.course_id WHERE ISAVALIABLE=0
AND EDU_COURSE_SUBJECT.SUBJECT_ID=#{e.subjectId}
AND EDU_COURSE.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{e.courseName},'%')
AND EDU_COURSE.is_pay=0
ORDER BY EDU_COURSE.ADDTIME DESC
ORDER BY EDU_COURSE.ADDTIME ASC
ORDER BY EDU_COURSE_PROFILE.viewcount ASC
